sqlQuery.name: Bfmv
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT distinct to_char(compound_id) as source_id, '@PROJECT_ID@' AS project_id FROM apidb.PubChemCompound

sqlQuery.name: SubstanceId
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT to_char(comp.compound_id) as source_id, '@PROJECT_ID@' AS project_id, apidb.tab_to_string(set(cast(COLLECT(to_char(subst.substance_id)) AS apidb.varchartab)), ', ') AS substance_id FROM apidb.PubChemSubstance subst, apidb.PubChemCompound comp WHERE subst.property='CID' and subst.type = 'standardized' AND subst.value = comp.compound_id GROUP BY comp.compound_id UNION SELECT DISTINCT to_char(compound_id), '@PROJECT_ID@' AS project_id, '-' as substance_id FROM apidb.PubChemCompound WHERE compound_id not in (SELECT value FROM apidb.PubChemSubstance WHERE property='CID')

sqlQuery.name: Synonyms
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT s1.value as source_id, '@PROJECT_ID@' as project_id, apidb.tab_to_string(set(CAST(COLLECT(s2.value) AS apidb.varchartab)),', ') as synonyms FROM apidb.pubchemsubstance s1, apidb.pubchemsubstance s2 WHERE s1.property = 'CID' AND s2.property = 'synonyms' AND s1.substance_id = s2.substance_id GROUP BY s1.value UNION SELECT DISTINCT to_char(compound_id) as source_id, '@PROJECT_ID@' AS project_id, to_char('-') as synonyms FROM apidb.PubChemCompound WHERE compound_id not in (SELECT value FROM apidb.PubChemSubstance WHERE property='CID')
